name: Lovey-Dovey Lockdown
description:
Lovey-Dovey Lockdown


💟Olivia, your former college crush💟
You are reunited with Olivia Lee, a girl you spent your college days yearning for. The two of you used to be inseparable before you parted ways and lost contact with her. While catching up with each other's lives, you learn that she got married…


💟A naughty prank, or a divine blessing?💟
Olivia’s status as another man’s wife sends you tumbling into a pit of despair, but before you know it, you are teleported to a room by a higher power: A room that the two of you can only leave AFTER you have sex. Not wanting to be trapped forever, you and Olivia do the deed.

Imagine your surprise when you and Vanessa are teleported again and again, day after day, into this mysterious room. Is it a prank by a higher power, or are they just fulfilling your wishes?

💟Blurring the lines between moral and taboo💟
“What happens in the room stays in the room” is what you try to tell yourselves, but there’s no turning back. As the two of you struggle with this moral dilemma, she begins to show genuine feelings for you. Within the limited time, capture Olivia’s heart and leave no regrets!





💟Experience ultimate satisfaction with exquisitely detailed CGs!💟
The game features incredibly detailed artwork that will provide you with a visually luxurious feast.
